data.title: The Traitors US Season 3 Winner Odds: Britney Haynes is the 6/4 FAVOURITE to win the upcoming season of The Traitors with contestants announced!
data.meta_description: The Traitors US Season 3 officially has a cast and odds are now given on who will win the show this time around...
data.text:
Britney Haynes is the early favourite to win the third season of The Traitors US

The Traitors continues to be a massively successful format across the television world and betting sites are now offering odds on the third season of the US version with contestants now announced.

The Traitors US differs from the UK version with the contestants all celebrities, although they aren't well known for the British audience with the majority coming from American reality television programmes that are not broadcast in the UK.

Included in the cast are former Big Brother stars with Britney Haynes, who appeared in Big Brother US on three different occassions, the early favourite to win The Traitors US.

Haynes is 6/4 in the market to win The Traitors US with the third season set to air around the same time as the UK version in January of 2025.

Rob Mariano and Nikki Garcia follow in the betting market to win the Traitors with Garcia arguably the most famous contestant this season due to her past career as WWE star Nikki Bella.

What the expert says...

Former Big Brother star Britney Haynes is the early favourite to win the third season of The Traitors US with the latest odds putting her well clear of the rest of the contestants with a 40% chance that she wins the show.

Jake Ashton - Entertainment Betting Expert - OLBG.com

UK's Traitors is set to return in the New Year for the third series

The UK edition of The Traitors is also set to return to screens in January following the success of its second season on the BBC.

Success is actually an understatement with viewership doubling from season 1 going from an average of 3.5m viewers to 7m in season 2.

The finale of the second series hit over 8m viewers with is unheard of for a modern day linear television show and the BBC have regularly stated that the show has been one of their biggest ever launches.
